generic <typename T> where T : value classpublic ref class Instrument abstract : System::Diagnostics::Metrics::Instrument

Docs.typeparam: The type that the instrument represents.
Docs.summary: The base class for all non-observable instruments.

remarks.format:
## Remarks
This class supports only the following generic parameter types: <xref:System.Byte>, <xref:System.Int16>, <xref:System.Int32>, <xref:System.Int64>, <xref:System.Single>, <xref:System.Double>, and <xref:System.Decimal>.
